text: First Presbyterian Church is a historic Presbyterian church located at La Grange, Lewis County, Missouri. It was built in 1848, and is a one-story, temple front, Greek Revival style, red brick building on a raised basement. It has a gabled roof with an unadorned wood raked cornice and a pediment on the symmetrical façade. (includes 5 photographs from 2011) It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2012. ==References== Category:Presbyterian churches in Missouri Category:Churches on the National Register of Historic Places in Missouri Category:Greek Revival church buildings in Missouri Category:Churches completed in 1848 Category:Buildings and structures in Lewis County, Missouri Category:National Register of Historic Places in Lewis County, Missouri
title: First Presbyterian Church (La Grange, Missouri)
